price: 95.Nabiyow Yalli neh warseeh neh madqeemit usuk Numma yeceek, toysa isin Nabii Ibraahim kicniih kaal muggaqsima mara kinnitoonumut Numma yacee mara tekkeenik, kay diiniy Yalli Nabii Mucammad Arrabat madqe kataata Aka diinittek xabanah gacak, Nabii Ibraahim usuk Yallah Aba Qibaadat Yallat Agleyta haa marih numuh masuginna keenik ixxic.
arabic: قُلۡ صَدَقَ ٱللَّهُۗ فَٱتَّبِعُواْ مِلَّةَ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ حَنِيفٗاۖ وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qul ṣadaqa al-lahu fa-ittabiʿū millata ib'rāhīma ḥanīfan wamā kāna mina al-mush'rikīna
